name: Marvelous Mr Egg
description:
The Marvelous Mr Egg needs to keep it's Creativity flowing, but it is not always easy, as everything around him seems to want his attention!

A Pesky snail wants to see your work up close, a bird constantly sings at your window, Mr Cat is waiting for his food, a neighboor needs your help and your phone keeps buzzing!

Not easy to concentrate in these conditions! Will you help Mr Egg with his work? Controls:
  • Click and Hold the working area on the table to create art piece.
  • Click on disrupters (They have red arrow) to deal with them.
Ludum Dare 46

This game was created in two days for the Ludum Dare 46. We had a blast producing it, we hope you'll have fun trying it !
